page.title: 02PARKSIDE FARM-HADLEY ROAD
page.content: Parkside Farm occupies 315 acres.All the grassland is used for grazing and conservation to support a dairy herd of 130 Friesian milkers.All cattle are kept in covered yards in winter as the land,which is predominately London boulder clay is too wet.All the grassland is intensively managed. The soft fruit and vegetable area is harvested on a self-pick basis when the general public come onto the farm. Machinery includes Milking parlour,5 tractors, cultivating equipment, balers,combine harvester,forklift, bulldozer,silage feeder,waggons, trailers and haymaking equipment. F.J.Whitman and Sons Ltd are tenant farmers of the GLC.4 people work full -time on the farm.The wheat crop is sold off the farm soon after harvest, and all the straw is baled for winter bedding in the cattle yards.
